text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires confirmation that the Reporting Cadence of the GAAR Defense control is set at a minimum frequency of quarterly updates to the Audit Committee. The candidate answer lists several controls related to GAAR exposure management (Section 5). Control point 5.1 (GAAR indicator assessment) has a cadence of 'Quarterly; immediate escalation for any high-risk item.' This satisfies the requirement for a quarterly cadence for the GAAR control.", "criterion_id": "31bc88c7-9bb4-4cb0-a9f5-8499628bdaf1"}
